mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of cases argued and adjudged in the Court of King's Bench: during the time Lord Mansfield's presiding in that court, from Michaelmas term, 30 Geo. II. 1756, to Easter term, 12 Geo. III. 1772 / By Sir James Burrow, knt. .. With the addition of marginal notes and references to the reports of the same cases
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Burrow, James, 1701-1782
Great Britain. Court of King's Bench.
Mansfield, William Murray Earl of, 1705-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by A. Strahan and W. Woodfall for E. and R. Brooke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Vols. 1-2, 4th ed., corrected; v. 3, 3d ed., corrected; v. 4-5, 2d. ed.; corrected.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
